article.title: Charles_V
article.paragraph: redirectCarlos Vthe candy barCarlos V (chocolate bar)Charles Vmay refer to:

list.listitem: Charles V, Holy Roman Emperor(15001558), also Carlos I of Spain
Charles V of Naples(16611700), better known as Carlos II of Spain
Charles V of France(13381380), called the Wise
Infante Carlos of Spain, Count of Molina(17881855), first Carlist pretender to the throne of Spain (as Charles V)
